greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of g.f. Product_{i>0} (1 + Sum_{j=1..k} (-1)^j*j*x^(j*i)).
mathematica: col[k_] := col[k] = Product[1+Sum[(-1)^j*j*x^(i*j), {j, 1, k}], {i, 1, 2 nmax}] + O[x]^(2 nmax) // CoefficientList[#, x]&;
Table[A[n-k, k], {n, 0, nmax}, {k, n, 0, -1}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 21 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Oct 05 2017
